interface.name: treeland_personalization_manager_v1
interface.description:
This interface allows a client to customized display effects.
Warning! The protocol described in this file is currently in the testing phase. Backward compatible changes may be added together with the corresponding interface version bump. Backward incompatible changes can only be done by creating a new major version of the extension.

request.name: get_window_context
request.description: set window background, shadow based on context

interface.name: personalization_wallpaper_context_v1
interface.description:
This interface allows a client personalization wallpaper.
Warning! The protocol described in this file is currently in the testing phase. Backward compatible changes may be added together with the corresponding interface version bump. Backward incompatible changes can only be done by creating a new major version of the extension.

description.summary: set the current user's wallpaper fd

entry.name: preview
entry.summary: whether to show a preview of the picture

description.summary: Set whether the current wallpaper is dark

event.name: metadata
event.description: Send this signal after getting the user's wallpaper.

interface.name: personalization_cursor_context_v1
interface.description:
This interface allows a client personalization cursor.
Warning! The protocol described in this file is currently in the testing phase. Backward compatible changes may be added together with the corresponding interface version bump. Backward incompatible changes can only be done by creating a new major version of the extension.

request.name: commit
request.description: if only one commit fails validation, the commit will fail

event.name: verfity
event.description: Send this signal after commit cursor configure.

arg.name: success
arg.summary: check whether the configuration is successful

event.name: theme
event.description: Send this signal after system cursor theme changed.

event.name: size
event.description: Send this signal after system cursor size changed.
